sahatiyawa = sahithyapaya nithi shathakaya 19 minisa babuluwanne kruthriwama bahira aatopayen ෙnawana bawa dakwayi. 19 sanda kaluma wilas wu muthharath ran walallath lakala hisa kesath namath kusum angaragath meyina dana no we dul bas wilasnen dilum we barana nowa wadanna may op nagimen dilenne widyawashasthryanhi athi shrenashtathwa yan eya nodanimehi athi thuchjathawath dakwayi. 20 widuwa danata ruwey kith sapath lankerey ee rada piduma labay dew guptha wath bogakaray widesa gamanedi nayek gurun ge gurek we ebandu widu nodaththa moda siwpa sathek may rajapadayatath wada kawithwaya age kota salakayi. 21 iwasathoth piyawadan kumata da?
